subject: Mathematics
question_en: What is the difference between profit and gain?
question_hi: प्रतिशत (प्राकृतिक लाभ) और लाभ (लाभ और कमान) की अर्थ क्या है?
A_en: Profit is a part of gain, while gain is the total benefit obtained.
A_hi: प्राकृतिक लाभ (प्रतिशत लाभ) वाला प्राकृतिक कमान (लाभ और कमान) की अर्थ क्या है?
B_en: Gain is the surplus amount obtained after subtracting the cost price from the selling price, while profit is the difference between the selling price and the cost price.
B_hi: लाभ आपदा और मान को कमान की अर्थ क्या है?
C_en: Price difference represents the difference between the selling price and the cost price, while profit is a part of the gain.
C_hi: पैंक आजीविक विभिज्ञान की अर्थ क्या है?
D_en: In percentage terms, profit is calculated as a percentage of cost price, while gain is calculated as a percentage of the selling price.
D_hi: पैंक परिणाम की अर्थ की अर्थ क्या है?
E_en: In profit and loss calculation, what is the difference between profit and loss?
E_hi: पैंक और लॉस को कोईना के अर्थ क्या है?
F_en: What is the relationship between profit and cost price?
F_hi: पैंक और कोईना का संबंध क्या है?
G_en: How is profit calculated in percentage terms?
